title: Private Resort (1985) Johnny Depp (Crazy comedy,ENG-POL-PORT)
description:
Private Resort (1985) Johnny Depp's 2nd film  <a href="
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0089839/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0089839/</a>

Dual audio track: 1)original English 2) Polish 'lektor'
Optional Polish subtitles in Text format
Burned-in yellow Portugese subtitles

With Rob Morrow (Numb3rs) and Hector Elizondo

Hilarious crazy-comedy where Johnny Depp (then 22) and Rob Morrow (then 23) run around in a summer resort with lots of more or less naked women. Depp starred in 'Nightmare on Elm street' the year before, whereas Morrow had his debut in this one.

DVDrip.
Color widescreen 496x272 with surprisingly good picture quality, original mono sound.

This is indeed not my rip, I found it on the net using PirateBay's tracker, so I thought it should be represented here. It is the only available torrent for this rare film.

If you are allergic to subtitles, you should make an exception in this case and just imagine that you are on holiday abroad.

The original English soundtrack plays in WMP and in DivX Player. In the latter, you can right-click and choose audio track 2. If you cannot turn off the extra, optional Polish subs, you can copy the avi file to another directory. DO NOT delete the Text document with the subs, then you will be unable to seed.

The file behaves normally in my newest standalone DivX player. Both audio tracks can be selected, and the extra Polish subs can be turned on or off.
